meanings.sent1: She overcures the meat, making it too tough to eat.
meanings.sent2: The doctor overcures the patient, causing more harm than good.
meanings.sent3: Grandma always overcures the cookies, but we still love her baking.
meanings.sent4: His obsession with perfection overcures every project he works on.
meanings.sent5: The sun overcures the paint, leaving it cracked and faded.

meanings.sent1: The overcures medicine cabinet was filled with expired medications.
meanings.sent2: She had an overcures supply of bandages for any injury.
meanings.sent3: The overcures first aid kit was so heavy, it was hard to carry.
meanings.sent4: His overcures collection of herbal remedies filled the entire shelf.
meanings.sent5: The overcures amount of ointments made her feel prepared for any ailment.
